Verses: 1 appozhudhu Soogiyanaana Pildhaadh Pradhiyuththaramaaga:
2 neer Endhamattum Ippadippattavaigalaip Pesuveer? Edhuvaraikkum Ummudaiya Vaayin Vaarththaigal Balamaana Kaatraippolirukkum?
3 dhevan Nyaayaththaip Purattuvaaro? Sarvavallavar Needhiyaip Purattuvaaro?
4 ummudaiya Pillaigal Avarukku Virodhamaaip Paavancheydhirundhaalum Avargaludaiya Paadhagaththin Aakkinaikku Avargalai Avar Oppukkoduththirundhaalum,
5 neer Dhevanai Erkanave Thedi, Sarvavallavarai Nokki Vinnappancheydhu,
6 suththamum Semmaiyumaai Irundheereyaanaal, Appozhudhu Avar Umakkaaga Vizhiththu Needhiyulla Ummudaiya Vaasasthalaththai Saangobaangamaakkuvaar.
7 ummudaiya Thuvakkam Arpamaayirundhaalum, Ummudaiya Mudivu Sampooranamaayirukkum.
8 aagaiyaal, Neer Mundhina Thalaimuraiyaaridaththil Visaariththu, Avargal Munnorgalin Seydhiyai Aaraaindhupaarum.
9 naam Netru Undaanavargal, Ondrum Ariyom; Boomiyinmel Nammudaiya Naatkal Nizhalaippolirukkiradhu.
10 avargal Umakku Ubadhesiththu, Umakkuth Theriviththu, Thangal Irudhayaththilirukkum Nyaayangalai Velippaduththuvaargal Allavo?
11 serillaamal Naanal Ongi Valarumo? Thanneerillaamal Koraippul Mulaikkumo?
12 adhu Innum Pachchaiyaayirukkumpodhe, Arukkappadaadhirundhum Matra Endhap Pullaippaarkkilum Seekkiramaai Vaadippom Allavo?
13 dhevanai Marakkira Ellaarudaiya Vazhigalum Appadiye Irukkum; Maayakkaararin Nambikkai Azhindhupom.
14 avanudaiya Veen Ennam Atruppoi, Avanudaiya Nambikkai Silandhippoochchi Veedupolirukkum.
15 oruvan Adhin Veettinmel Saaindhaal, Adhu Nilaikkamaattaadhu; Adhaip Pidiththaal, Adhu Nirkaadhu.
16 veyil Erikkaadhadharku Munne Avan Pachchaichchedi, Adhin Kodigal Avan Thottaththinmele Padarum.
17 adhin Vergal Karkuviyalil Sikki, Karpaaraiyai Naadum.
18 adhu Adhinidaththil Iraadhapadikku Nirmoolamaanapin, Adhu Irundha Idam Unnai Naan Kandadhillaiyendru Marudhalikkum.
19 idho, Avan Vazhiyin Magizhchchi Ippadiye Pogiradhu; Aanaalum Vere Per Mannilirundhu Mulaippaargal.
20 idho, Dhevan Uththamanai Verukkiradhumillai, Pollaadhavargalukkuk Kaikodukkiradhumillai.
21 ini Avar Ummudaiya Vaayai Nagaippinaalum, Ummudaiya Udhadugalai Gembeeraththinaalum Nirappuvaar.
22 ummaip Pagaikkiravargal Vetkaththaal Moodappaduvaargal; Dhunmaarkkarudaiya Koodaaram Azhindhupogum Endraan.
